description.en_US: Shoot a single enemy to hex them with a lingering explosion.
Creates a shield that resists \c[3]30%\c[0] of all damage and provides knockback resistance for a brief time.
An arc of explosions which hits enemies in front of you.
Shoot a barrage of homing fireballs in a wide arc.
A barrage of explosive fireballs that is continuously aimed.
Deal out a cluster of lingering icicle spellcards that impale any enemy that comes in contact with them.
A swirling ice attack followed by a deployed turret which aims at your cursor.
Shoot a row of hail spikes that aim at nearby targets
Shoot a more powerful row of hail spears that pierce multiple enemies.
Cast a protective barrier of ice spikes that deal contact damage and block light projectiles. Any remaining ice will shoot ourwards when the barrier expires.
Call down two rotating laser beams that devastate an area around where they were cast.
A hex that summons waves of swirling snowflakes which shoot at nearby enemies.
Stun and damage enemies in a small area in front of you before knocking them away with a lightning bolt.
Stun and damage enemies in a larger area in front of you.
Hit an enemy with a hex that causes minor lightning strikes and slows the target's time flow by \c[3]-15%\c[0] for a short time. Only one Throttle Hex can be active at a time.
Experience time at a faster rate for a brief period. Slightly reduces ATK, FOC stats while active.
Dash and leave behind a spellcard which will return to you after a delay, damaging enemies as it travels.
A more powerful dash attack which leaves behind stronger magnet cards.
Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying.
description.de_DE: Starker Frontalangriff, der alle getroffenen Feinde weit wegstößt.
description.zh_CN: 面向前方的高伤害攻击，可将所有命中的敌人击飞。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 面向前方的高傷害攻擊，可以將所有命中的敵人擊飛。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 前方の敵を遠くに吹き飛ばす、高ダメージの攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 높은 대미지의 정면 공격으로, 공격받은 모든 적을 날려버립니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Hit an enemy with a hex that absorbs HP.
Place a recall point on first use. On subsequent uses, place a new recall point and teleport back to your previous one, causing an explosion upon arrival.
Deal a healing card which will replenish up to \c[2]+20%\c[0] of your HP over time. The card is fragile and will break with enemy attacks.
Place a trap card which explodes on enemy contact. If \c[3]Wave Recall\c[0] is active, detonate the recall card for a more powerful explosion which draws in enemies.
Enter an ethereal state to recover \c[2]+20%\c[0] of your HP and heal status conditions. This process will leave you \c[1]slowed\c[0] for a period afterwards.
Summons a powerful aura that periodically explodes around the caster.
